# Site Architecture

- /: Homepage with personal introduction and key highlights.
- /projects: Portfolio of data science, analytics, and full-stack projects.
- /blog: Articles on analytics, product thinking, and data storytelling.
- /resume: Professional experience, education, skills, and certifications.
- /contact: Contact form and social links.
- /games: Interactive games and experiments (Snake, Tic-Tac-Toe, Minesweeper).
- /playground: Interactive Python playground with Pyodide integration.
